explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a split screen. On the left side is a grayish-white background with the yellow subtitle "Cover." A man's head is superimposed on a white toilet. He has a ruddy complexion, a bright smile, and pearly white teeth. In the center, a Roblox character stands on a red brick wall, swaying from side to side. The character is an odd amalgamation with a loudspeaker for a head, wearing a gray shirt on the left side, red on the right, and black pants. The right side has a purple background with the yellow subtitle "Original." A pale-skinned man's head is superimposed on a gray toilet with robotic arms. He has short black hair, wears purple headphones, and has a mischievous smile. At the bottom of the screen, there is a speech bubble icon on the left and a like icon on the right.

[0-3] The toilet man's head on the left shakes continuously, and a red icon appears. The toilet man on the right moves his jaw, and an image emerges from his mouth, displaying a man wearing sunglasses. The Roblox character moves to the right, its shirt turns red, and it begins to dance rhythmically. A grayish-white watermark, "@XDSCHOOL," appears at the bottom center of the screen.

[13-17] The screen undergoes a significant change. A large pink frame appears with the dark blue text "Which version do you like? AII" above it, along with four images. Below the text is the black number "3," and at the bottom are three icons: a white and blue speech bubble icon, a black page-turning icon, and a like icon, from left to right. A white mouse cursor moves back and forth. The number "3" changes to "2" and then "1." Finally, the pink frame shrinks and disappears, and the screen returns to the same state as at the beginning of the video.
